title: The battle for 'hearts and minds' a year before Brexit
text:
The battle for 'hearts and minds' a year before Brexit   01:51 
With a year until Brexit, Reuters has the met volunteers still fighting the EU's corner on Britain's doorsteps- and taken a look at the policy decisions that lie ahead.   
With a year until Brexit, Reuters has the met volunteers still fighting the EU's corner on Britain's doorsteps- and taken a look at the policy decisions that lie ahead.  //reut.rs/2J1nMY6
